title: Workshop for Improving Secondary Mathematics Instructional Design Based on Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: A process where pre-service teachers analyze learner data collected in VR learning environments to explore methods for optimizing lesson design

learning_goals: Learners can interpret behavioral data collected from VR math simulations using learning analytics tools.
Learners can propose at least three personalized math instructional design strategies based on analysis results.
Learners can design and implement collaboration protocols between educational decision-makers (teachers) and technology providers (developers).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
